DOC.brief_summary: Direct acting antivirals offer a new opportunity to monitor the immune response in Hepatitis C infection. In this study cytokine markers will be measured during therapy up to time point SVR 12 an correlated to clinical Parameters and regular laboratory findings.
DOC.brief_title: Immune Monitoring of Hepatitis C Under DAA Therapy
DOC.criteria: written consent, age, HCVRNA positive, DAA therapy
